purposes.description: With the help of the tracking number you can track your packages and see the estimated time of delivery. If a DHL location is stored as delivery address, you can view it by using Bing Maps.
You can use the Standortfinder on this website to search for our branches, Packstations and parcel shops, which are displayed on a Bing Maps map.

purposes.description: For some shipments we offer a live tracking function that allows you to follow the path of your shipment live on a Google Maps map.

Within tracking, you will see an option to redirect your shipment to a Packstation or branch if you are not going to be at home at the time of delivery. You can select the appropriate Packstation/branch on a map from Google Maps.
